title: [Large-Scale] Online Doctoral Program Design for Educational Technology Leadership

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of educational technology theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: Emphasis on transformative learning and community-building activities in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Distinguish and explain at least three strategies for designing and operating online learning environments.
Develop educational scenarios applying transformative learning theory within the context of educational technology leadership.
Present a multi-phase process (2+ stages) for building a learner knowledge-sharing community using collaborative tools.
Design assessment strategies in blended learning environments and provide feasibility-based feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
